title: When Rob Lucci killed 500 hostages and took the captain's head
author: One Piece Gold
description: An article analyzing the infamous 500 hostages incident from Rob Lucci's past, exploring the moral implications and how it shaped his Dark Justice philosophy.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the Enies Lobby arc conclusion

title: 305: Shivering Past! Dark Justice and Rob Lucci!
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: A first-time watcher's perspective on Episode 305, discussing the shocking revelation of Lucci's backstory and the disturbing nature of his Dark Justice philosophy.

title: C&C - One Piece - Shivering Past! Dark Justice and Rob Lucci! [6/20]
author: Anime Superhero Forum Community
description: Community discussion thread for Episode 305's Toonami broadcast, with fans reacting to Lucci's dark backstory and the intensity of the Luffy vs Lucci battle.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Thread may contain spoilers from manga readers

title: Analysis: Lucci's 'Weakness is a Sin' Philosophy
author: calgaras
description: A thoughtful analysis of Rob Lucci's philosophy that 'weakness is a sin,' arguing that it's not weakness itself Lucci hates, but rather the failure to carry out justice. The post explores how Dark Justice and Absolute Justice share similar ruthless ideologies.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains analysis that references later arcs

title: One Piece Episode 305 - IMDb
author: IMDb
description: IMDb database entry for Episode 305 featuring user ratings (8.9/10), air dates, and basic episode information.
